meanings.definition: The quality of being full of fighting spirit or determination.
meanings.sent1: Her scrappinesses in the competition impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The team's scrappinesses led them to victory in the game.
meanings.sent3: His scrappinesses in the face of challenges made him a true champion.
meanings.sent4: The scrappinesses of the underdog team inspired the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The scrappinesses of the small kitten trying to climb the stairs was heartwarming.

meanings.definition: The state of being made up of various disparate elements.
meanings.sent1: The artwork's scrappinesses reflected the artist's eclectic style.
meanings.sent2: The town's scrappinesses gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent3: The scrappinesses of the jigsaw puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: The scrappinesses of the quilt showcased different fabrics beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The scrappinesses of the salad ingredients created a delicious mix of flavors.

meanings.definition: The act of using resourcefulness and creativity to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: Her scrappinesses in problem-solving saved the project.
meanings.sent2: The entrepreneur's scrappinesses helped launch the successful business.
meanings.sent3: The scrappinesses of the inventor led to groundbreaking innovations.
meanings.sent4: The scrappinesses of the chef resulted in a unique and tasty dish.
meanings.sent5: The scrappinesses of the students in the science fair impressed the judges.
